        <td id="L53" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="53"></td>
        <td id="LC53" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line"> XII. The Adventure of the Copper Beeches</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L54" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="54"></td>
        <td id="LC54" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L55" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="55"></td>
        <td id="LC55" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L56" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="56"></td>
        <td id="LC56" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L57" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="57"></td>
        <td id="LC57" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L58" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="58"></td>
        <td id="LC58" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ADVENTURE I. A SCANDAL IN BOHEMIA</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L59" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="59"></td>
        <td id="LC59" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L60" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="60"></td>
        <td id="LC60" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L61" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="61"></td>
        <td id="LC61" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L62" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="62"></td>
        <td id="LC62" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To Sherlock Holmes she is always THE woman. I have seldom heard</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L63" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="63"></td>
        <td id="LC63" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him mention her under any other name. In his eyes she eclipses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L64" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="64"></td>
        <td id="LC64" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and predominates the whole of her sex. It was not that he felt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L65" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="65"></td>
        <td id="LC65" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any emotion akin to love for Irene Adler. All emotions, and that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L66" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="66"></td>
        <td id="LC66" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one particularly, were abhorrent to his cold, precise but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L67" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="67"></td>
        <td id="LC67" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">admirably balanced mind. He was, I take it, the most perfect</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L68" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="68"></td>
        <td id="LC68" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reasoning and observing machine that the world has seen, but as a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L69" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="69"></td>
        <td id="LC69" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lover he would have placed himself in a false position. He never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L70" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="70"></td>
        <td id="LC70" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoke of the softer passions, save with a gibe and a sneer. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L71" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="71"></td>
        <td id="LC71" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were admirable things for the observer--excellent for drawing the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L72" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="72"></td>
        <td id="LC72" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">veil from men&#39;s motives and actions. But for the trained reasoner</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L73" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="73"></td>
        <td id="LC73" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to admit such intrusions into his own delicate and finely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L74" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="74"></td>
        <td id="LC74" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">adjusted temperament was to introduce a distracting factor which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L75" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="75"></td>
        <td id="LC75" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might throw a doubt upon all his mental results. Grit in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L76" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="76"></td>
        <td id="LC76" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sensitive instrument, or a crack in one of his own high-power</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L77" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="77"></td>
        <td id="LC77" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lenses, would not be more disturbing than a strong emotion in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L78" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="78"></td>
        <td id="LC78" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature such as his. And yet there was but one woman to him, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L79" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="79"></td>
        <td id="LC79" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that woman was the late Irene Adler, of dubious and questionable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L80" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="80"></td>
        <td id="LC80" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">memory.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L81" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="81"></td>
        <td id="LC81" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L82" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="82"></td>
        <td id="LC82" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had seen little of Holmes lately. My marriage had drifted us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L83" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="83"></td>
        <td id="LC83" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away from each other. My own complete happiness, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L84" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="84"></td>
        <td id="LC84" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">home-centred interests which rise up around the man who first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L85" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="85"></td>
        <td id="LC85" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finds himself master of his own establishment, were sufficient to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L86" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="86"></td>
        <td id="LC86" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absorb all my attention, while Holmes, who loathed every form of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L87" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="87"></td>
        <td id="LC87" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">society with his whole Bohemian soul, remained in our lodgings in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L88" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="88"></td>
        <td id="LC88" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Baker Street, buried among his old books, and alternating from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L89" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="89"></td>
        <td id="LC89" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">week to week between cocaine and ambition, the drowsiness of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L90" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="90"></td>
        <td id="LC90" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drug, and the fierce energy of his own keen nature. He was still,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L91" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="91"></td>
        <td id="LC91" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as ever, deeply attracted by the study of crime, and occupied his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L92" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="92"></td>
        <td id="LC92" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">immense faculties and extraordinary powers of observation in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L93" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="93"></td>
        <td id="LC93" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">following out those clues, and clearing up those mysteries which</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L94" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="94"></td>
        <td id="LC94" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been abandoned as hopeless by the official police. From time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L95" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="95"></td>
        <td id="LC95" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to time I heard some vague account of his doings: of his summons</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L96" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="96"></td>
        <td id="LC96" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Odessa in the case of the Trepoff murder, of his clearing up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L97" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="97"></td>
        <td id="LC97" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the singular tragedy of the Atkinson brothers at Trincomalee,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L98" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="98"></td>
        <td id="LC98" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and finally of the mission which he had accomplished so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L99" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="99"></td>
        <td id="LC99" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">delicately and successfully for the reigning family of Holland.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="100"></td>
        <td id="LC100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Beyond these signs of his activity, however, which I merely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="101"></td>
        <td id="LC101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shared with all the readers of the daily press, I knew little of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="102"></td>
        <td id="LC102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my former friend and companion.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="103"></td>
        <td id="LC103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="104"></td>
        <td id="LC104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One night--it was on the twentieth of March, 1888--I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="105"></td>
        <td id="LC105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">returning from a journey to a patient (for I had now returned to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="106"></td>
        <td id="LC106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">civil practice), when my way led me through Baker Street. As I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="107"></td>
        <td id="LC107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passed the well-remembered door, which must always be associated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="108"></td>
        <td id="LC108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in my mind with my wooing, and with the dark incidents of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="109"></td>
        <td id="LC109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Study in Scarlet, I was seized with a keen desire to see Holmes</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="207"></td>

        <td id="L1083" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1083"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1084" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1084"></td>
        <td id="LC1084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am Mr. Holmes,&quot; answered my companion, looking at her with a</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1111"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1172"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1173"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1175"></td>
        <td id="LC1175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bowed, and, turning away without observing the hand which the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1176"></td>
        <td id="LC1176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">King had stretched out to him, he set off in my company for his</td>

</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L1643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1643"></td>
        <td id="LC1643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1644"></td>
        <td id="LC1644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, sir. And no later than this morning. I went to my work as</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2583" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2583"></td>
        <td id="LC2583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be conspicuous. Very retiring and gentlemanly he was. Even his</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2585" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2585"></td>
        <td id="LC2585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was young, he told me, and it had left him with a weak throat,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2586" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2586"></td>

        <td id="L2957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2957"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2958"></td>
        <td id="LC2958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Our visitor collapsed into a chair, with a ghastly face and a</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L3334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3334"></td>
        <td id="LC3334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What is the young man&#39;s own account of the matter?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3335"></td>
        <td id="LC3335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3336"></td>
        <td id="LC3336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It is, I am afraid, not very encouraging to his supporters,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3337"></td>
        <td id="LC3337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though there are one or two points in it which are suggestive.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3338"></td>
        <td id="LC3338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">You will find it here, and may read it for yourself.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3339"></td>
        <td id="LC3339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3340"></td>
        <td id="LC3340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He picked out from his bundle a copy of the local Herefordshire</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3341"></td>
        <td id="LC3341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">paper, and having turned down the sheet he pointed out the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3342"></td>
        <td id="LC3342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">paragraph in which the unfortunate young man had given his own</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3343"></td>
        <td id="LC3343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">statement of what had occurred. I settled myself down in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3344"></td>
        <td id="LC3344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corner of the carriage and read it very carefully. It ran in this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3345"></td>
        <td id="LC3345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3346"></td>
        <td id="LC3346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3347"></td>
        <td id="LC3347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Mr. James McCarthy, the only son of the deceased, was then called</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3348"></td>
        <td id="LC3348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and gave evidence as follows: &#39;I had been away from home for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3349"></td>
        <td id="LC3349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">three days at Bristol, and had only just returned upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3350"></td>
        <td id="LC3350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning of last Monday, the 3rd. My father was absent from home at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3351"></td>
        <td id="LC3351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the time of my arrival, and I was informed by the maid that he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3352"></td>
        <td id="LC3352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had driven over to Ross with John Cobb, the groom. Shortly after</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3353"></td>
        <td id="LC3353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my return I heard the wheels of his trap in the yard, and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3354"></td>
        <td id="LC3354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking out of my window, I saw him get out and walk rapidly out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3355"></td>
        <td id="LC3355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the yard, though I was not aware in which direction he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3356"></td>
        <td id="LC3356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going. I then took my gun and strolled out in the direction of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3357"></td>
        <td id="LC3357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Boscombe Pool, with the intention of visiting the rabbit</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3358"></td>
        <td id="LC3358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">warren which is upon the other side. On my way I saw William</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3359"></td>
        <td id="LC3359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Crowder, the game-keeper, as he had stated in his evidence; but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3360"></td>
        <td id="LC3360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he is mistaken in thinking that I was following my father. I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3361"></td>
        <td id="LC3361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no idea that he was in front of me. When about a hundred yards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3362"></td>
        <td id="LC3362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the pool I heard a cry of &quot;Cooee!&quot; which was a usual signal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3363"></td>
        <td id="LC3363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">between my father and myself. I then hurried forward, and found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3364"></td>
        <td id="LC3364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him standing by the pool. He appeared to be much surprised at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3365"></td>
        <td id="LC3365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seeing me and asked me rather roughly what I was doing there. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3366"></td>
        <td id="LC3366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conversation ensued which led to high words and almost to blows,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3367"></td>
        <td id="LC3367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for my father was a man of a very violent temper. Seeing that his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3368"></td>
        <td id="LC3368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passion was becoming ungovernable, I left him and returned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3369"></td>
        <td id="LC3369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towards Hatherley Farm. I had not gone more than 150 yards,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3370"></td>
        <td id="LC3370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, when I heard a hideous outcry behind me, which caused me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3371"></td>
        <td id="LC3371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to run back again. I found my father expiring upon the ground,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3372"></td>
        <td id="LC3372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with his head terribly injured. I dropped my gun and held him in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3373"></td>
        <td id="LC3373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my arms, but he almost instantly expired. I knelt beside him for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3374"></td>
        <td id="LC3374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some minutes, and then made my way to Mr. Turner&#39;s lodge-keeper,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3375"></td>
        <td id="LC3375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his house being the nearest, to ask for assistance. I saw no one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3376"></td>
        <td id="LC3376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">near my father when I returned, and I have no idea how he came by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3377"></td>
        <td id="LC3377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his injuries. He was not a popular man, being somewhat cold and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3378"></td>
        <td id="LC3378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forbidding in his manners, but he had, as far as I know, no</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3379"></td>
        <td id="LC3379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">active enemies. I know nothing further of the matter.&#39;</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3380"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3381"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3414"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3420"></td>

        <td id="L3421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3421"></td>

        <td id="L3422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3422"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3424"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3425"></td>
        <td id="LC3425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;The Coroner: What do you mean?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3426"></td>
        <td id="LC3426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3427"></td>
        <td id="LC3427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Witness: I was so disturbed and excited as I rushed out into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3428"></td>
        <td id="LC3428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the open, that I could think of nothing except of my father. Yet</td>

        <td id="L3523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3523"></td>

        <td id="L3711" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3711"></td>
        <td id="LC3711" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bermuda Dockyard, so that there is really no tie between them. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3712"></td>
        <td id="LC3712" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">think that that bit of news has consoled young McCarthy for all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3713"></td>
        <td id="LC3713" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he has suffered.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3714"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3715" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3715"></td>
        <td id="LC3715" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But if he is innocent, who has done it?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3716" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3716"></td>
        <td id="LC3716" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3717" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3717"></td>
        <td id="LC3717" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah! who? I would call your attention very particularly to two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3718" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3718"></td>
        <td id="LC3718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">points. One is that the murdered man had an appointment with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3719" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3719"></td>
        <td id="LC3719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">someone at the pool, and that the someone could not have been his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3720" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3720"></td>
        <td id="LC3720" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">son, for his son was away, and he did not know when he would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3721"></td>
        <td id="LC3721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">return. The second is that the murdered man was heard to cry</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3722"></td>
        <td id="LC3722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&#39;Cooee!&#39; before he knew that his son had returned. Those are the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3723" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3723"></td>
        <td id="LC3723" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crucial points upon which the case depends. And now let us talk</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3726" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3726"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3727" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3727"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L3772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3772"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3789"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3790"></td>
        <td id="LC3790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sherlock Holmes was transformed when he was hot upon such a scent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3791"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3792"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3793"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3794"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3795"></td>
        <td id="LC3795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His face was bent downward, his shoulders bowed, his lips</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3796"></td>
        <td id="LC3796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">compressed, and the veins stood out like whipcord in his long,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3797"></td>
        <td id="LC3797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sinewy neck. His nostrils seemed to dilate with a purely animal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3798"></td>
        <td id="LC3798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lust for the chase, and his mind was so absolutely concentrated</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3799"></td>
        <td id="LC3799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the matter before him that a question or remark fell</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3800"></td>
        <td id="LC3800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unheeded upon his ears, or, at the most, only provoked a quick,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3801"></td>
        <td id="LC3801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impatient snarl in reply. Swiftly and silently he made his way</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3802"></td>
        <td id="LC3802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along the track which ran through the meadows, and so by way of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3803"></td>
        <td id="LC3803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the woods to the Boscombe Pool. It was damp, marshy ground, as is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3804"></td>

        <td id="LC4087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;What?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4088"></td>
        <td id="LC4088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4089"></td>
        <td id="LC4089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am no official agent. I understand that it was your daughter</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4090"></td>
        <td id="LC4090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who required my presence here, and I am acting in her interests.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4091"></td>
        <td id="LC4091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Young McCarthy must be got off, however.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4092"></td>
        <td id="LC4092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4093"></td>
        <td id="LC4093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am a dying man,&quot; said old Turner. &quot;I have had diabetes for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4094"></td>
        <td id="LC4094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">years. My doctor says it is a question whether I shall live a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4095"></td>
        <td id="LC4095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">month. Yet I would rather die under my own roof than in a gaol.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4096"></td>
        <td id="LC4096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4097"></td>
        <td id="LC4097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes rose and sat down at the table with his pen in his hand</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4098"></td>
        <td id="LC4098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a bundle of paper before him. &quot;Just tell us the truth,&quot; he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4099"></td>
        <td id="LC4099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said. &quot;I shall jot down the facts. You will sign it, and Watson</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4100"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4101"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4102"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4103"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4104"></td>

        <td id="L4105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4105"></td>

        <td id="L4106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4106"></td>

        <td id="L4108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4108"></td>
        <td id="LC4108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will not take me long to tell.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4109"></td>
        <td id="LC4109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4110"></td>
        <td id="LC4110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You didn&#39;t know this dead man, McCarthy. He was a devil</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4111"></td>
        <td id="LC4111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">incarnate. I tell you that. God keep you out of the clutches of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4112"></td>
        <td id="LC4112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">such a man as he. His grip has been upon me these twenty years,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4113"></td>
        <td id="LC4113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and he has blasted my life. I&#39;ll tell you first how I came to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4114"></td>
        <td id="LC4114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his power.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4115"></td>
        <td id="LC4115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4116"></td>
        <td id="LC4116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;It was in the early &#39;60&#39;s at the diggings. I was a young chap</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4117"></td>
        <td id="LC4117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then, hot-blooded and reckless, ready to turn my hand at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4118"></td>
        <td id="LC4118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything; I got among bad companions, took to drink, had no luck</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4119"></td>
        <td id="LC4119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with my claim, took to the bush, and in a word became what you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4120"></td>
        <td id="LC4120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would call over here a highway robber. There were six of us, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4121"></td>
        <td id="LC4121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we had a wild, free life of it, sticking up a station from time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4122"></td>
        <td id="LC4122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to time, or stopping the wagons on the road to the diggings.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4123"></td>
        <td id="LC4123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Black Jack of Ballarat was the name I went under, and our party</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4124"></td>
        <td id="LC4124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is still remembered in the colony as the Ballarat Gang.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4125"></td>
        <td id="LC4125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4126"></td>
        <td id="LC4126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;One day a gold convoy came down from Ballarat to Melbourne, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4127"></td>
        <td id="LC4127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we lay in wait for it and attacked it. There were six troopers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4128"></td>
        <td id="LC4128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and six of us, so it was a close thing, but we emptied four of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4129"></td>
        <td id="LC4129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their saddles at the first volley. Three of our boys were killed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4130"></td>
        <td id="LC4130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, before we got the swag. I put my pistol to the head of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4131"></td>
        <td id="LC4131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the wagon-driver, who was this very man McCarthy. I wish to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4132"></td>
        <td id="LC4132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lord that I had shot him then, but I spared him, though I saw his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4133"></td>
        <td id="LC4133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wicked little eyes fixed on my face, as though to remember every</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4134"></td>
        <td id="LC4134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feature. We got away with the gold, became wealthy men, and made</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4135"></td>
        <td id="LC4135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our way over to England without being suspected. There I parted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4136"></td>
        <td id="LC4136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from my old pals and determined to settle down to a quiet and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4137"></td>
        <td id="LC4137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">respectable life. I bought this estate, which chanced to be in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4138" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4138"></td>
        <td id="LC4138" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the market, and I set myself to do a little good with my money,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4139" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4139"></td>
        <td id="LC4139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to make up for the way in which I had earned it. I married, too,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4140"></td>
        <td id="LC4140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and though my wife died young she left me my dear little Alice.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4141"></td>
        <td id="LC4141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Even when she was just a baby her wee hand seemed to lead me down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4142"></td>
        <td id="LC4142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the right path as nothing else had ever done. In a word, I turned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4143"></td>
        <td id="LC4143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over a new leaf and did my best to make up for the past. All was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4144"></td>
        <td id="LC4144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going well when McCarthy laid his grip upon me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4145"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4146"></td>
        <td id="LC4146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I had gone up to town about an investment, and I met him in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4147"></td>
        <td id="LC4147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Regent Street with hardly a coat to his back or a boot to his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4148"></td>
        <td id="LC4148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foot.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4149"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4150"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4151"></td>
        <td id="LC4151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as good as a family to you. There&#39;s two of us, me and my son, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4152"></td>
        <td id="LC4152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you can have the keeping of us. If you don&#39;t--it&#39;s a fine,</td>

        <td id="L4153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4153"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4154"></td>
        <td id="LC4154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">within hail.&#39;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4155"></td>
        <td id="LC4155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4156"></td>
        <td id="LC4156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, down they came to the west country, there was no shaking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4157"></td>
        <td id="LC4157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them off, and there they have lived rent free on my best land</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4158"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4160"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4161"></td>
        <td id="LC4161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afraid of her knowing my past than of the police. Whatever he</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4165"></td>
        <td id="LC4165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4166"></td>
        <td id="LC4166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;His son, you see, had grown up, and so had my girl, and as I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4167"></td>
        <td id="LC4167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">known to be in weak health, it seemed a fine stroke to him that</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4168"></td>
        <td id="LC4168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his lad should step into the whole property. But there I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4169"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4170"></td>
        <td id="LC4170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had any dislike to the lad, but his blood was in him, and that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4171"></td>
        <td id="LC4171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was enough. I stood firm. McCarthy threatened. I braved him to do</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4172"></td>
        <td id="LC4172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his worst. We were to meet at the pool midway between our houses</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4173"></td>
        <td id="LC4173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to talk it over.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4174"></td>
        <td id="LC4174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4175"></td>
        <td id="LC4175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;When I went down there I found him talking with his son, so I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4176"></td>
        <td id="LC4176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smoked a cigar and waited behind a tree until he should be alone.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4177"></td>
        <td id="LC4177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But as I listened to his talk all that was black and bitter in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4178"></td>
        <td id="LC4178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me seemed to come uppermost. He was urging his son to marry my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4179"></td>

</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4553"></td>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4632"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L4641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4641"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4642"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4643"></td>
        <td id="LC4643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4644"></td>
        <td id="LC4644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah!&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4645"></td>
        <td id="LC4645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4646"></td>
        <td id="LC4646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But they listened to my story with a smile. I am convinced that</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6152"></td>
        <td id="LC6152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a Lascar, was well paid by me for his rooms, so that I knew that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6153"></td>
        <td id="LC6153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my secret was safe in his possession.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6154"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6155"></td>
        <td id="LC6155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Well, very soon I found that I was saving considerable sums of</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L6156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6156"></td>
        <td id="LC6156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">money. I do not mean that any beggar in the streets of London</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6157"></td>
        <td id="LC6157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">could earn 700 pounds a year--which is less than my average</td>

        <td id="L6230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6230"></td>
        <td id="LC6230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">VII. THE ADVENTURE OF THE BLUE CARBUNCLE</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L6232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6232"></td>
        <td id="LC6232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had called upon my friend Sherlock Holmes upon the second</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6233"></td>
        <td id="LC6233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning after Christmas, with the intention of wishing him the</td>

        <td id="L6234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6234"></td>

        <td id="L6238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6238"></td>
        <td id="LC6238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">on the angle of the back hung a very seedy and disreputable</td>

        <td id="L6239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6239"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6244" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6244"></td>
        <td id="LC6244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You are engaged,&quot; said I; &quot;perhaps I interrupt you.&quot;</td>
      </tr>

</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8310"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8312"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8783"></td>
        <td id="LC8783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, in the grounds of my neighbours. These good people were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8784"></td>
        <td id="LC8784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absolutely ignorant that their land contained that which was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8785"></td>
        <td id="LC8785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite as valuable as a gold-mine. Naturally, it was to my</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L8786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8786"></td>
        <td id="LC8786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest to buy their land before they discovered its true value,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8787"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L8788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8788"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8789"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L8876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8876"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L8967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="8967"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L10195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10195"></td>
        <td id="LC10195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Perhaps, Mrs. Moulton, you would like my friend and me to leave</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10197"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10198"></td>
        <td id="LC10198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;If I may give an opinion,&quot; remarked the strange gentleman,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10199"></td>
        <td id="LC10199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;we&#39;ve had just a little too much secrecy over this business</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10200"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC10202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clean-shaven, with a sharp face and alert manner.</td>

        <td id="L10203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10203"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10204"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10206"></td>
        <td id="LC10206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was working a claim. We were engaged to each other, Frank and I;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10207"></td>
        <td id="LC10207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but then one day father struck a rich pocket and made a pile,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10208"></td>
        <td id="LC10208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">while poor Frank here had a claim that petered out and came to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10209"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10210"></td>
        <td id="LC10210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wouldn&#39;t hear of our engagement lasting any longer, and he took</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10213"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L10214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10214"></td>

      </tr>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10283"></td>

        <td id="L10471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10471"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L10633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10633"></td>

        <td id="L10643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10643"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10644"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10650"></td>
        <td id="LC10650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purses and expensive habits. He learned to play heavily at cards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10651"></td>
        <td id="LC10651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and to squander money on the turf, until he had again and again</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10652"></td>
        <td id="LC10652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to come to me and implore me to give him an advance upon his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10653"></td>
        <td id="LC10653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allowance, that he might settle his debts of honour. He tried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10654"></td>
        <td id="LC10654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more than once to break away from the dangerous company which he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10655"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10656"></td>
        <td id="LC10656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">George Burnwell, was enough to draw him back again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10657"></td>
        <td id="LC10657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L10658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10658"></td>

        <td id="LC10844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for any words of mine to influence him. There was but one way for</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L10941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="10941"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11411"></td>

        <td id="LC11412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secret.&quot;</td>
      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L11504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="11504"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L12625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12625"></td>
        <td id="LC12625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but just left everything in Mr. Rucastle&#39;s hands. He knew he was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12626"></td>
        <td id="LC12626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">safe with her; but when there was a chance of a husband coming</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12627"></td>
        <td id="LC12627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">forward, who would ask for all that the law would give him, then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12628"></td>
        <td id="LC12628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her father thought it time to put a stop on it. He wanted her to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12629"></td>
        <td id="LC12629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sign a paper, so that whether she married or not, he could use</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12630"></td>
        <td id="LC12630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her money. When she wouldn&#39;t do it, he kept on worrying her until</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12631"></td>
        <td id="LC12631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she got brain-fever, and for six weeks was at death&#39;s door. Then</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12632"></td>
        <td id="LC12632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she got better at last, all worn to a shadow, and with her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12633"></td>
        <td id="LC12633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beautiful hair cut off; but that didn&#39;t make no change in her</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12634"></td>
        <td id="LC12634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young man, and he stuck to her as true as man could be.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12635"></td>
        <td id="LC12635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12636"></td>
        <td id="LC12636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Ah,&quot; said Holmes, &quot;I think that what you have been good enough</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12637"></td>
        <td id="LC12637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to tell us makes the matter fairly clear, and that I can deduce</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12638"></td>
        <td id="LC12638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all that remains. Mr. Rucastle then, I presume, took to this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12639" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12639"></td>
        <td id="LC12639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">system of imprisonment?&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12640"></td>
        <td id="LC12640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12641"></td>
        <td id="LC12641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Yes, sir.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12642"></td>
        <td id="LC12642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12643"></td>
        <td id="LC12643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And brought Miss Hunter down from London in order to get rid of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12644" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12644"></td>
        <td id="LC12644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the disagreeable persistence of Mr. Fowler.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12645"></td>
        <td id="LC12645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12646"></td>
        <td id="LC12646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;That was it, sir.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12647"></td>
        <td id="LC12647" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12648"></td>
        <td id="LC12648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;But Mr. Fowler being a persevering man, as a good seaman should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12649"></td>
        <td id="LC12649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be, blockaded the house, and having met you succeeded by certain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12650"></td>
        <td id="LC12650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arguments, metallic or otherwise, in convincing you that your</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12651"></td>
        <td id="LC12651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interests were the same as his.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12652"></td>
        <td id="LC12652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12653" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12653"></td>
        <td id="LC12653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;Mr. Fowler was a very kind-spoken, free-handed gentleman,&quot; said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12654"></td>
        <td id="LC12654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Mrs. Toller serenely.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12655"></td>
        <td id="LC12655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12656"></td>
        <td id="LC12656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;And in this way he managed that your good man should have no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12657"></td>
        <td id="LC12657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">want of drink, and that a ladder should be ready at the moment</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12658"></td>
        <td id="LC12658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when your master had gone out.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12659"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12660"></td>
        <td id="LC12660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;You have it, sir, just as it happened.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12661"></td>
        <td id="LC12661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12662"></td>
        <td id="LC12662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">&quot;I am sure we owe you an apology, Mrs. Toller,&quot; said Holmes, &quot;for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12663"></td>
        <td id="LC12663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you have certainly cleared up everything which puzzled us. And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12664"></td>
        <td id="LC12664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here comes the country surgeon and Mrs. Rucastle, so I think,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12665"></td>
        <td id="LC12665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Watson, that we had best escort Miss Hunter back to Winchester,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12666"></td>
        <td id="LC12666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as it seems to me that our locus standi now is rather a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12667"></td>
        <td id="LC12667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">questionable one.&quot;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12668"></td>
        <td id="LC12668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12669"></td>
        <td id="LC12669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And thus was solved the mystery of the sinister house with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12670"></td>
        <td id="LC12670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">copper beeches in front of the door. Mr. Rucastle survived, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12671"></td>
        <td id="LC12671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was always a broken man, kept alive solely through the care of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12672"></td>
        <td id="LC12672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his devoted wife. They still live with their old servants, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12673"></td>
        <td id="LC12673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">probably know so much of Rucastle&#39;s past life that he finds it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12674"></td>
        <td id="LC12674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">difficult to part from them. Mr. Fowler and Miss Rucastle were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12675"></td>
        <td id="LC12675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">married, by special license, in Southampton the day after their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12676"></td>
        <td id="LC12676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flight, and he is now the holder of a government appointment in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12677"></td>
        <td id="LC12677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the island of Mauritius. As to Miss Violet Hunter, my friend</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12678"></td>
        <td id="LC12678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes, rather to my disappointment, manifested no further</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12679"></td>
        <td id="LC12679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest in her when once she had ceased to be the centre of one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12680"></td>
        <td id="LC12680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his problems, and she is now the head of a private school at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12681"></td>
        <td id="LC12681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Walsall, where I believe that she has met with considerable success.</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12812"></td>
        <td id="LC12812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">1.E.3.  If an individual Project Gutenberg-tm electronic work is posted</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L12887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12887"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12888"></td>
        <td id="LC12888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effort to identify, do copyright research on, transcribe and proofread</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12889"></td>
        <td id="LC12889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">public domain works in creating the Project Gutenberg-tm</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12891"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC12900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation, the owner of the Project</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12901"></td>
