      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12902"></td>
        <td id="LC12902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gutenberg-tm electronic work under this agreement, disclaim all</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12905"></td>
        <td id="LC12905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">LIABILITY, BREACH OF WARRANTY OR BREACH OF CONTRACT EXCEPT THOSE</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12906"></td>
        <td id="LC12906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">PROVIDED IN PARAGRAPH 1.F.3.  YOU AGREE THAT THE FOUNDATION, THE</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12907"></td>
        <td id="LC12907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">TRADEMARK OWNER, AND ANY DISTRIBUTOR UNDER THIS AGREEMENT WILL NOT BE</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12908"></td>
        <td id="LC12908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">LIABLE TO YOU FOR ACTUAL, DIRECT, INDIRECT, CONSEQUENTIAL, PUNITIVE OR</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12909"></td>
        <td id="LC12909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">INCIDENTAL DAMAGES EVEN IF YOU GIVE NOTICE OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12910"></td>
        <td id="LC12910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">DAMAGE.</td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12912"></td>
        <td id="LC12912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">1.F.3.  LIMITED RIGHT OF REPLACEMENT OR REFUND - If you discover a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12913"></td>
        <td id="LC12913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">defect in this electronic work within 90 days of receiving it, you can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12914"></td>
        <td id="LC12914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">receive a refund of the money (if any) you paid for it by sending a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12915"></td>
        <td id="LC12915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">written explanation to the person you received the work from.  If you</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12916"></td>
        <td id="LC12916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">received the work on a physical medium, you must return the medium with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12917"></td>
        <td id="LC12917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your written explanation.  The person or entity that provided you with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12918"></td>
        <td id="LC12918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the defective work may elect to provide a replacement copy in lieu of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12919"></td>
        <td id="LC12919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">refund.  If you received the work electronically, the person or entity</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12920"></td>
        <td id="LC12920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">providing it to you may choose to give you a second opportunity to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12921"></td>
        <td id="LC12921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">receive the work electronically in lieu of a refund.  If the second copy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12922"></td>
        <td id="LC12922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is also defective, you may demand a refund in writing without further</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12923"></td>
        <td id="LC12923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">opportunities to fix the problem.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L12924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12924"></td>
        <td id="LC12924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L12952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12952"></td>

        <td id="L12953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="12953"></td>
        <td id="LC12953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">electronic works in formats readable by the widest variety of computers</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC12954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">including obsolete, old, middle-aged and new computers.  It exists</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13000"></td>
        <td id="LC13000" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">increasing the number of public domain and licensed works that can be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13001"></td>
        <td id="LC13001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">freely distributed in machine readable form accessible by the widest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13002"></td>
        <td id="LC13002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">array of equipment including outdated equipment.  Many small donations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13003"></td>
        <td id="LC13003" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">($1 to $5,000) are particularly important to maintaining tax exempt</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13004" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13004"></td>
        <td id="LC13004" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">status with the IRS.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13005" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13005"></td>
        <td id="LC13005" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13006" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13006"></td>
        <td id="LC13006" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Foundation is committed to complying with the laws regulating</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13007" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13007"></td>
        <td id="LC13007" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">charities and charitable donations in all 50 states of the United</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13008"></td>
        <td id="LC13008" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">States.  Compliance requirements are not uniform and it takes a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13009"></td>
        <td id="LC13009" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">considerable effort, much paperwork and many fees to meet and keep up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13010"></td>
        <td id="LC13010" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with these requirements.  We do not solicit donations in locations</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13011" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13011"></td>
        <td id="LC13011" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where we have not received written confirmation of compliance.  To</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13012" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13012"></td>
        <td id="LC13012" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">SEND DONATIONS or determine the status of compliance for any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13013"></td>
        <td id="LC13013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">particular state visit http://pglaf.org</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13014"></td>
        <td id="LC13014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13015"></td>
        <td id="LC13015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">While we cannot and do not solicit contributions from states where we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13016"></td>
        <td id="LC13016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have not met the solicitation requirements, we know of no prohibition</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13017" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13017"></td>
        <td id="LC13017" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against accepting unsolicited donations from donors in such states who</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC13018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">approach us with offers to donate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13019" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13019"></td>
        <td id="LC13019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13020"></td>
        <td id="LC13020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">International donations are gratefully accepted, but we cannot make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13021" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13021"></td>
        <td id="LC13021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any statements concerning tax treatment of donations received from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L13023" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="13023"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
